page.title: 09Chelmer Village Centre
page.content: Asda is Chelmer Village's handy superstore.It was built here before any houses.There are also small shops around the village square.There is a{ {chemist, a newsagents,}(which is also a toy shop)There is a{chip shop},a {photographers studio},a{furniture {shop a Building Society}and a{ {hairdressers}.People come from far around to shop at Asdas because you can get almost everything you could think of there and there is lots of car parking space.Towards the end of the week is the busiest time because the local people come to do the weeks shopping.Asda is at one end of the village but when the village is finaly completed it will be in the middle of the village.
